objects.description: During [SharePoint ToolShell Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0058), threat actors extracted information from the compromised systems.(Citation: Microsoft SharePoint Exploit JUL 2025)(Citation: ESET ToolShell JUL 2025)(Citation: SentinelOne ToolShell JUL 2025)(Citation: Palo Alto SharePoint Vulnerabilities JUL 2025)
